original_text: “After an absence of several years, I came to Jerusalem to bring my people gifts for the poor and to present offerings.
korean_text: 여러 해 만에 내가 내 민족을 구제할 것과 제물을 가지고 와서

sentences.original_text: After an absence of several years,
to bring my people gifts for the poor
sentences.korean_translation: 가난한 자들을 위해 내 백성에게 선물을 가져오고
